name: Visual Novel Maker - Vamwolf Cross† Collection
detailed_description:
Warning

Note that the contents of this pack only may be used in projects as long as the following is true:

  • The material is used in non-commercial (free) games only.
  • The material is not used in any projects containing adult-only content.
  • The material is not used in any projects containing gore.
  • The material is not used in any projects that infringe upon copyright of any individual or company.
  • The material is used as-is, without any personal edits or modifications.


About the Game

A series of grisly murders paints a picture of danger in modern Japan. The curious state of the victims suggest something supernatural is at the root of the case, but it will be up to the Vamwolf hunters to unravel the mystery - that is if they can first deal with romantic rivalries and whispers of betrayal in their midst! This is the world of 「Vamwolf Cross†」, an enchanting visual novel published by D3 Publisher.

「Vamwolf Cross†」Collection is now available for use in your non-commercial VNM projects! Add a dash of mystery and a splash of style with the main and supporting cast of 「Vamwolf Cross†」and its gorgeous settings. Whether you're looking to expand the 「Vamwolf Cross†」universe with a fan story or looking for stunning visuals for your original novel, you can't go wrong with 「Vamwolf Cross†」Collection!

This pack includes 9 expressions for 5 main characters with two clothing options, 4 expressions for 6 supporting cast and 29 locations - including both environments of everyday life (such as apartment building, rooms, dining area and more!) and environments for adventure and romance (church, hospital, restaurant, beach and more!).

This collection contains:


■Characters■

[Vamwolf Hunter]
※ Includes 9 expressions for each character:

・Nagisa（東雲渚）
・Ryunosuke（常盤龍之介）

・Shuichi（蒼井修一）
・Yuya（金月優哉）

・Keidai（仁藤恵大）
※ Includes the following outfits:
・Casual
・Hunting Garb

[Sub Characters]
※ Includes 4 expressions for each character:
・Soichiro（惣一郎）
・Kosaka（コウサカ）
・Kadowaki（カドワキ）
・Sukiin（枢機院）
・Blackvampire（漆黒の吸血鬼）
・Scarletvampire（緋色の吸血狼）

〇About animation patterns
※Most expressions have 2-4 patterns, with the following variations:
[Talking with eyes open]
・Idle expression「openeyetaiki」
・Talking Expression「openeyekaiwa」
[Talking with eyes closed]
・Idle Expression「closeeyetaiki」
・Talking Expression「closeeyekaiwa」

■Backgrounds■


[Apartment]
Apartment Outside（Morning, Evening, Night）
Heroine room（Morning, Evening, Night, Night lights off）
Nagisa room（Morning, Evening, Night, Night lights off）
Shuichi room（Morning, Evening, Night, Night lights off）
Ryunosuke room（Morning, Evening, Night, Night lights off）
Yuya room（Morning, Evening, Night, Night lights off）
Keidai room（Morning, Evening, Night, Night lights off）
First floor Hallway（Morning, Evening, Night）
Second floor Hallway（Morning, Evening, Night）
Apartment Dining（Morning, Evening, Night）
Dressing room
Balcony（Morning, Evening, Night）
Courtyard（Morning, Evening, Night）

[Others]
Chapel（Morning, Evening, Night, Night with lights on）
Church Basement
Hospital Hallway
Hospital Private room
Bar
Restaurant
Cafe
Museum
Stations Front（Morning, Evening, Night）
Riverbed
Residential area（Morning, Evening, Night）
Park（Morning, Evening, Night）
Beach
Forest（Morning, Evening, Night）
Ruin
Shipboard

※This content use is subject to the Collaboration resource EULA, please check before use.
